urls.title: Anthony urges residents to help save Cambridgeshire‚Äôs waterways
urls.description: Anthony Browne, MP for South Cambridgeshire, is asking residents to engage with a new consultation from the Environment Agency to ensure Cambridge is classed as an area of ‚Äúwater stress‚Äù

tweets.text:
On @BBCCambs soon to discuss a new consultation from @EnvAgency on methodology classifying Cambridgeshire as an area of water stress.

We face serious problems with water shortages, impacting valuable natural resources such as chalk streams. More info üëá
https://t.co/ZfVOs9I2Qq

These guides will be really useful to help landowners protect themselves from #flooding 

We're working with @YorkshirePFR to raise awareness of   measures property owners can take to reduce flood risk #PFR @CityofYork @JBAConsulting @LivingWithH2O Visit 
https://t.co/t8taERHVnz https://t.co/RhswAtzVAs

Thank you for agreeing to be the first in this series, profiling farmers up and down the Thame, in all 'clusters', aiming for understanding, shared aims, bigger impacts and positive outcomes @EnvAgency @RothschildFnd @thameswater @eddie_rixon @agricology @PondRiverStream https://t.co/FnLsBYDHJL

@ab4scambs @BBCCambs @EnvAgency According to the @EnvAgency it appears that @Cambswater are over abstracting local chalk streams to the tune of 22 million litres of water per day.

Perhaps you can ask @Cambswater what are their plans to stop doing that. https://t.co/UBZuI9uf3p

tweets.text:
Work‚Äôs progressing well on the Caton Rd flood defences, with the riverside path expected to reopen in March. 

The flood wall was completed in Dec but some works have continued, including installation of copings, resurfacing, and tree planting. 

More info https://t.co/avZ3oj8l0E https://t.co/CFbq3q5Ngn

Today marks the launch of @RiverActionUK's  first campaign. We are calling on major agricultural suppliers and producers to clean up their act and our rivers, starting with the River Wye.

Visit our website for more infoüëâ https://t.co/dH0DIfzTSP https://t.co/LrqpD5F22E

The moat @Bishops_Palace @VisitWells full of @MendipHillsAONB soil probably slurry, nitrates and phosphates too after today‚Äôs rain. @EnvAgencySW what you gonna do about it? @suesustainable @Ecohustler https://t.co/QwAXKsWfXE

Work has begun this week on #Kendal's ¬£76million #flood defences, over 5 years since #StormDesmond #flooded thousands of homes and #businesses here. The @EnvAgency says it needed time to get it right but some say it's still not right. I'll have more on @ITVBorder at 6pm. https://t.co/tXtj5WyEev

üö® NEW EPISODE ALERT üö®

LIVE NOW! @EmmaHowardBoyd, Chair of the @EnvAgency, joins @MLiebreich. Don't miss this episode with one of the leading voices in the UK‚Äôs Environment scene!

If the regulators won't deal with it somebody else will.

Delighted to be a part of @RiverActionUK a powerful new voice for rivers. 

https://t.co/KcMMZ3R0Ez
@EnvAgency has launched it's charm offensive ahead of its planning application for a 300-metre dam paid for by a 400 acre quarry.   Not needed, not wanted, worst option:   https://t.co/ABcnLPlDuf

Day four.
Still got diesel/oil emanating from Furness Vale Marina on the Peak Forest Canal. The boat is covered in it, dozens of geese and ducks are in the contaminated water, and it stinks like a refinery. Any chance of some action SOON please? @CRTContactUs @CRTNorthWest https://t.co/TxtPwEhlwp

Webinar: Once again this winter we have seen flooding have an impact on communities, homes and buildings. But what exactly can we do‚Ä¶ how do we better adapt to homes and buildings being flooded.
 
https://t.co/br2cKlKbSh https://t.co/vfvMeblWdH
Great to see the issues around water quality addressed by @jamesingham in @BBCSouthNews yesterday. For those who missed it yet item starts at 12:24 https://t.co/o7RL6uKKck

I discovered today that the Thames Conservancy ordered that all discharge of sewage into the river must cease in 1868. 150 years later we're still waiting @LDNWaterkeeper @cleansafethames @Thames21 @WindrushWasp @WodcNews @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency @theriverstrust @RachSalv
